title: Todoist’s app now lets you add tasks to your to-do list by speaking to its AI
description: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.
content: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.
